channel.title: How do I get a Router for my server?
channel.description:
Ok, I just need to know if DSL Wireless internet connection comes with a router. If it doesn't how do I get one? Is it offered by a specific Internet Service?
~Dezza

item.title: How do I get a Router for my server?
item.dc:creator: @Dezza Dezza
item.source: How do I get a Router for my server?

item.title: How do I get a Router for my server?
item.dc:creator: @runescapekid runescapekid
item.description:
@runescapekid wrote:

right if you have broadband it already has a router but it is proberbly not wireless. what you need to do is buy a wireless router if you would like to host using no-ip.
i suggest to get a router from www.digidave.com
i think it is that if not search digidave on google. it has reconditioned routers on there which is where i got mine(they are cheaper than in shops)

or you could use hamachi. to do this i would suggest looking at a hamachi tutorial in tutorials then look in tutorial list

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get a Router for my server?
